ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"

if [ ! -f "/Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统/.orchestrator/state/mode.txt" ]; then
  echo "NEEDS_DEPLOY"
else
  echo "ALREADY_DEPLOYED"
fi

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"
if [ ! -d "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator" ]; then
  echo "ERROR: 源仓库不存在: $ORCHESTRATE_HOME"
  exit 1
fi
echo "SOURCE_OK: $ORCHESTRATE_HOME"

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"
mkdir -p .claude/hooks/lib
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/stop.sh" .claude/hooks/
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/subagent-stop.sh" .claude/hooks/
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/pre-compact.sh" .claude/hooks/
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/lib/loop-guard.sh" .claude/hooks/lib/
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/lib/state-manager.sh" .claude/hooks/lib/
cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/hooks/lib/json-utils

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"
mkdir -p .claude/agents
for f in "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.claude/agents/"*.md; do
  cp "$f" .claude/agents/
done
echo "Agents deployed: $(ls .claude/agents/*.md | wc -l | tr -d ' ') files"

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"
mkdir -p .orchestrator/{state,state/snapshots,tasks,workflows,scripts,results,plans,learnings}

# 工作流定义
for f in "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/workflows/"*.yaml; do
  cp "$f" .orchestrator/workflows/
done

# 任务池脚本
for f in "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/scripts/"*.sh; do
  cp "$f" .orchestrator/scripts/
done
chmod +x .orchestrator/scripts/*.sh

# 初始化状态文件
echo "off" > .orchestrator/state/mode.txt
echo '{"active":fals

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"

# Retry with safer glob handling
mkdir -p .orchestrator/{state,state/snapshots,tasks,workflows,scripts,results,plans,learnings}

# workflows
if ls "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/workflows/"*.yaml 2>/dev/null; then
  cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/workflows/"*.yaml .orchestrator/workflows/
fi
if ls "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/workflows/"*.yml 2>/dev/null; then
  cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/.orchestrator/workflows/"

# Smart merge settings.json
HOOKS_JSON='{
  "Stop": [{"hooks": [{"type": "command", "command": ".claude/hooks/stop.sh", "timeout": 10}]}],
  "SubagentStop": [{"hooks": [{"type": "command", "command": ".claude/hooks/subagent-stop.sh", "timeout": 10}]}],
  "PreCompact": [{"hooks": [{"type": "command", "command": ".claude/hooks/pre-compact.sh", "timeout": 10}]}]
}'

cd /Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统

if [ -f .claude/settings.json ]; then
  MERGED=$(jq --argjson new_hooks "$HOOKS_JSON" '
    .hooks

ORCHESTRATE_HOME="${ORCHESTRATE_HOME:-$HOME/projects/claude-omo-agentflow}"
cd /Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统
if [ ! -f AGENTS.md ]; then
  cp "$ORCHESTRATE_HOME/AGENTS.md" ./
  echo "AGENTS.md created"
else
  echo "AGENTS.md already exists, skipped"
fi

cd /Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统
MARKER="## 掌天瓶 (Orchestrate)"

PARENT_CLAUDE="../CLAUDE.md"
if [ -f "$PARENT_CLAUDE" ]; then
  if ! grep -q "$MARKER" "$PARENT_CLAUDE"; then
    cat >> "$PARENT_CLAUDE" << 'SECTION'

## 掌天瓶 (Orchestrate)

本项目支持异构多代理掌天瓶。代理注册表见 `AGENTS.md`。
- **每次对话开始时**：读取 `.orchestrator/state/mode.txt`，在首次回复开头告知用户当前模式（如 `[掌天瓶: OFF]` 或 `[掌天瓶: ON]`）
- **自动模式推荐**：掌天瓶开启时，收到新任务先判断是否适合编排（3+ 独立子任务→Swarm，多阶段流程→Pipeline），适合则主动建议
- 启用掌天瓶：说"启用掌天瓶"或"orchestrate on"
- 关闭掌天瓶：说"关闭掌天瓶"或"orches

echo "on" > /Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统/.orchestrator/state/mode.txt
cat /Users/michael/projects/AI自进化系统/.orchestrator/state/mode.txt
